name: Z1 Battle Royale

reviews:
Its been a while, so it might have gotten better... but this game was no fun. I did play it quite a bit in the past, because my friends always wanted to play it, so I joined in, but it was bad.

The way the weapons felt wasn't good, the battle royale format still was in its early days and didn't really feel polished. The dropsystem was weak... I also think the genre just isn't my favorite to begin with.

The map felt pretty empty and you die very quickly against good players. The difference is incredibly. Might aswell not even get equip, as they'll be able to get you before you even see anyone.

I also think the game is pretty much dead nowadays, ah well, at least it is free.

Fuck this game & its 3rd party launcher + login.
Some chinese fker hacked it & got me banned years ago & Now i got a permanent stain on my account
Man I wish I could go back to before the game split.... :(

They kill the game so hard...
Bring me back to H1Z1!
Good Game. High Player Count 2025. Won 2/2

short_description: Z1 Battle Royale is a Free to Play, fast-paced, action arcade, competitive Battle Royale. Staying true to its "King of the Kill" roots, the game has been revamped and restored to the classic feel, look, and gameplay everyone fell in love with. Play solo, duos, or fives and be the last ones standing.
